name: Robert Downey Jr
description:
Robert John Downey Jr. (born April 4, 1965) is an American actor and producer. In 2008, Downey was named by Time magazine among the 100 most influential people in the world, and from 2013 to 2015, he was listed by Forbes as Hollywood's highest-paid actor.

Looking for something... spicy? Here's my Patreon! It will support my work. Also, I recently started a blog where I will gather resources and tutorials about my work here!

Hey Civitai! What you see here is a textual inversion of one of my favorite actors: Robert Downey Jr! I used 40 public images of him with an 8900 steps process. To use it in your works:

  • download the file and place it into stable-diffusion-webui>embeddings folder;

  • add robdowney65 to your prompt;

  • keep the sampling steps around 20/30, and CFG between 7 and 7.5 to work well. Great results with DPM++ SDE Karras & Edge Of Realism;

meta.prompt: a photo of robdowney65 ((smiling)), detailed background, hyper-detailed, detailed face, POV, by lee jeffries nikon d850 film stock photograph 4 kodak portra 400 camera f1.6 lens rich colors hyper-realistic lifelike texture dramatic lighting unreal engine trending on artstation cinestill 800
